text: The indoor high tech farming course (basic level) was very informative and interesting. I have learnt everything i needed to start growing my own vegetables at home. The trainer, Faith, was very knowledgeable and patient in explaining the concepts and steps to us. Highly recommended!

The beginner's course for High-Tech Indoor Farming was an eye-opener course. It gave me a great breadth of information that I can use to begin my own indoor farming journey. Really appreciate the instructor, Faith, for explaining the concepts and information clearly. Indeed well worth the Saturday!

Having done some research on my own the course helped to confirm some facts and de-bunked some myths. Faith (our Trainer for the day) was very helpful and very willing to share her expertise and experience with the class. For me it was a day well spent and after the course I take home with me confidence and info that will be put to good use in my garden(s). Highly recommended.

I have attended 2 online course with TLC so far. The training is by far the most professional and smooth riding among I have experienced. Faith is very knowledgeable. I have learned a lot and enjoyed all the courses.
This basic indoor high tech farming course is very informative for beginners and very well-organized. The instructor Faith is very clear in her delivery of the course content to the participants.
